data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: It's really hard to find a job in education right now. I've ____ to ____ 40 ____ and ____ only ____ back ____ 3 ____ them! Most ____ the ____ include a balance ____ teaching ____ research, although ____ require ____ work ____. If I am hired, I'll feel more secure.
data.partBlankContent: It's really hard to find a job in education right now. I've app____ to ov__ 40 jo__ and ha__ only he___ back fr__ 3 o_ them! Most o_ the posi_____ include a balance o_ teaching a__ research, although so__ require off___ work t__. If I am hired, I'll feel more secure.
data.answer: 现在在教育领域找工作真的很难。我申请了40多个职位，只收到了3个回复!大多数职位包括教学和研究的平衡，尽管有些也需要办公室工作。如果我被录用，我会觉得更有安全感。
